step.cmd: Download and install the new version using the appropriate instructions for your platform and the installation method you chose.
Start the to ensure that the application can start and that your license is recognized by the upgrade installation.

If you are upgrading from a minor version to a major version (for example, from 16.1 to 17.0) and you did not purchase a Maintenance Pack that covers the new major version (17.0), you will need to enter a new license for the new version (17) into the registration dialog box that is displayed when the plugin is started.
